name: [$PLAY GameJam] Bumper Clamber
description:
made for the $PLAY GameJam

Bumper Clamber

Liquid death is rising. Your only escape is to clamber to the top with your paddles and your bumpers.

Bumper Clamber is an action pinball tower climb. Defeat enemies and overcome challenges by knocking your marble around using precision and skill. Aim to reach the highest scores and ascend to new heights each time you play!

Control the paddles with A/D, Z/X, arrow keys, or mouse buttons.

My Twitter

Music provided by Crezno

Made with the Godot game engine. License info: https://godotengine.org/license
